analysis.description:
Reentrancy in OpportyWhiteListHold.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#364-377):
	External calls:
	- OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[msg.sender].tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#371-373)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderList (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#373-374)

OpportyWhiteListHold.returnTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#359-364) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,nTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#362-363)

OpportyWhiteListHold.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#364-377) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[msg.sender].tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol#371-373)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0x0ee14f47320604d894fffffc8639772382937bee.sol:
